### Install VS Code Extensions

Use these links to install the VS Code Extensions. Note: ***DO NOT*** install python when you install the `python extension`. You will install python from a different source in the next step.

- [Jupyter](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-toolsai.jupyter)
- [Live Share](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=MS-vsliveshare.vsliveshare)
- [Python](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-python.python)
- [Pylance](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-python.python)
- [Quarto](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=quarto.quarto)
